H0.text: Which former RAF pilot wrote the novel ‘Airport’. Roald Dahl

H2.text: Which former RAF pilot wrote the novel ‘Airport’. Derek Robinson

A4.text: In 1968 he achieved international fame with his fourth novel, Airport (Doubleday)
